data.title: Before Elsa Pataky married the MCU's Chris Hemsworth, her ex-boyfriend Adrien Brody bought her an incredible home. During Pataky and...
data.meta_description:
1,594 likes, 124 comments - meawwofficial on April 13, 2023: "Before Elsa Pataky married the MCU's Chris Hemsworth, her ex-boyfriend Adrien Brody bought her an incredible home. During Pataky and Brody's relationship, the former couple seemed to be very serious about each other before their sudden split. Brody even bought a castle he planned to live in with Pataky, and presented her with the castle on her birthday.

After Brody and Pataky went their separate ways, Adrien continued to renovate the castle he once shared with Elsa. In 2015, a documentary called Stone Barn Castle was released which revealed the seven years that Brody ultimately spent renovating the home he wanted to share with Pataky.

#adrienbrody #adriendbrodyfans #adrienbrodymovies #elsapataky #elsapatakymovies #chrishelmsworth #chrishelmsworthfans #chrishelmsworthalzheimers #adrienbrodycastle #adrienbrodyelsapataky".
